parameters: \m[1]We should see what Gus wants to show us.
\m[narrator]Much like this \ii[190], this white orb glows glows but the colors within only seem to disappear.
\m[narrator]Much like this \ii[190], this cyan orb glows but the colors within only seem to disappear.
A log book to keep track of the dues paid.
\n<Gus>No kid, you need to be behind your target. Let's try again.
\n<Gus>Remember \n[1], you need to be in stealth mode. Use \is[30] before approaching your target.\! Let's try again.
\m[narrator]Gus's cracks a half-hearted smile, but you can tell he's distressed.
\n<Gus>\N[1], \N[2] I didn't expect you here so early.
"Does this mean there's an opening in the guild?"
\n<Gus>You two understand the decrees of the \m[guild], do you not?
\n<Gus>In time you will learn them all. The most important of them all though.
\n<Gus>My, then you two shall be full members of the \m[guild] in no time!
\m[2]What do you mean, "Oh no"? We \c[6]pickpocketed\c[0] him just like you taught us.
\m[1]It means we just made a lot of \G!
\m[narrator]\N[2] holds the \ii[190] out towards Gus, downplaying how magnificent the item appears.
\m[narrator]Gus's eyes grow wide, their color almost sucked into the \ii[190] before he snaps back, frightened.
\n<Gus>A \m[highClass] in \map[15]\..\..\..\. now,\. with that \ii[190].\! It can only mean one thing.
\n<Gus>It's a prophecy young one... follow me.
"Does this mean there's an opening in the guild?"
\m[narrator]Gus stands in front of a large stone tablet, a faint glow behind it illuminates a room with two orbs similar to the \ii[190].
\n<Gus>Many years ago, when I was about your age. Before I was Head Master of the \m[guild]...
\n<Gus>This tablet was brought in here by a woman,\. a \nc[6].
\n<Gus>Yes \N[2], they're real... they come from the East, far from \m[Kingdom].
\m[1]Is this the "prophecy"? What does the tablet say?
\n<Gus>It speaks of a time when a black void will summon darkness across \m[world].
\n<Gus>That a \m[highClass] man will wander through desperation unphased to deliver the void to roylaty.
\m[1]This is a stretch Gus, even for you? Is \map[15] "desperation" in this tall tale?
\m[narrator]Gus is unflinching, his eyes closed as he recounts the prophecy by heart.

\n<Gus>"An orb like the ocean and an orb like the light. One glowing dimly, one glowing bright. Both will be delivered on the darkest night. Yet the darkest will be purloined one decades from blight."
\m[2]The harvest blight\..\..\..\. that started ten years ago today.
\m[1]This orb, why not just put with the others?
\n<Gus>We can't have them all together, it's too dangerous. No one will expect them here, but we can't take the chance.
\m[2]Why haven't you destroyed the two other orbs Gus?
\n<Gus>Oh child... I've tried. I've destroyed them. I've smashed them hundreds of times over the years.\! They simply reform, they reform right here at midnight every night.
\m[narrator]His voice quivers, obviously never having witnessed such powerful magic as this.
\n<Gus>There's a curse on this Dojo, I know it. You must take the \ii[190] as far from here as possible.
\m[1]Exactly! We'll sell it to Triton. It'll be halfway across \m[kingdom] by tonight.
\m[1]\}\fiPlus we may make a few hundred \G\fr\{
\n<Gus>This \fbcannot\fr fall into the wrong hands! You must understand.
\m[narrator]His eyes plead with you, he's obviously lost and out of options.
\m[2]We'll destroy it Gus. We'll take it to farthest end of \m[world] if we need to.

parameters.name: The Inkeeper Acts Really Nice, But Charges Outrageous Prices

parameters: \n<Gus>Go south, leave the city, leave \m[Kingdom]. Destroy the \ii[190].
\n<Gus>I can not let you through, you understand why.
<c:0,180,25>Take it, it means nothing to me!

parameters.name: The Inkeeper Acts Really Nice, But Charges Outrageous Prices

parameters: \n<Gus>No kid, you need to be behind your target. Let's try again.
\n<Gus>Remember \n[1], you need to be in stealth mode. Use \is[30] before approaching your target.\! Let's try again.
\n<Gus>No kid, you need to be behind your target. Let's try again.
\n<Gus>Remember \n[1], you need to be in stealth mode. Use \is[30] before approaching your target.\! Let's try again.
\n<Gus>It's time for your first lesson today.
\n<Gus>I've brought some new trainees out to help.
\n<Gus>Eagerness suits you young one. Today we will learn the \m[guild] technique for \is[30].
\m[1]Believe me, Gus. I know my way around the shadows.
\n<Gus>Focus now! You must learn the technique as taught by the \m[guild] elders..
\n<Gus>Then use your knowledge to expand your mind.
\n<Gus>Ha! Good job kid! How do you feel?
\n<Gus>You aren't even sneaking kid, try again!
\n<Gus>To \is[30] press the C key to enter Stealth Mode. From stealth you are invisible and can sneak up on almost anyone.
\n<Gus>I want you to sneak up on me now. From stealth I want you to meet me on the other side of the room and interact with me..
\n<Gus>Open the Skill Learn menu by pressing the K key, and learn the \is[30] skill under \nc[11].
\n<Gus>Now we will learn the \m[guild] technique for \is[31].
\n<Gus>It's a means of survival here in \map[15].
\n<Gus>Take the knowledge you learned and train the \is[31] skill under the \nc[11] job.
\n<Gus>Don't try and sneak up on me kid, you're trying to \is[31] the targets.
\n<Gus>Oh, I see you already have the \G.
\n<Gus>Great job Kai, now onto our final lesson for today.
\n<Gus>To use \is[31] you must be in stealth from the \is[30] skill we learned earlier.
\n<Gus>Then you simply want to walk up \fbbehind\fr your target and press the action button. This will bring up the Sneak Menu.
\m[1]I see... and that's how I can choice to \is[31]?
\n<Gus>Precisely! Among other actions as you learn more techniques.
\n<Gus>Beware though, not every target is easy to \is[31]. Some targets are more aware than others, in time you will learn to \is[34] but for now watch out for the Awareness \i[1495] indicator.
\m[1]Got it! What if I get caught?
\n<Gus>Here it won't matter. Out there though\., out there you'll need to escape or bribe your target.
\n<Gus>Our other trainees here are willing to try and let you \is[31] them.
\n<Gus>Bring me 15 \G to complete this trial. Anything leftover you happen to \is[31] is yours to keep.
\n<Gus>Take the knowledge you learned and train the \is[31] skill under the \nc[11] job.
\m[1]We should see what Gus wants to show us.
